item.description:
Join us for the latest season of our monthly potluck and $1 Permaculture Movie Nights! An enriching and affordable way to pass a winter's evening with other members of our local permaculture group, these evenings begin with a brief potluck supper and are followed by a newish movie with relevance to ecological living, permaculture and resilience-building.  This year we will be running movie nights once a month, December through April.


Our April film will be "Perennial Vegetables" with Eric Toensmeier. We will be watching two 30-minute segments of this film that focus on our climate (total video time for us will be about one hour) and then discussing the plants.  If you are growing some perennial vegetables and have little samples to bring for tasting, please do so!  (Although spring seems to be late this year):)

6:30  Potluck supper (bring a dish to share and your potluck kit - dish/bowl/utensils/cup)

7:00 Announcement (bring any you have!) followed by the movie!

8:00 Brief De-brief and Closing....

The Resilience Hub & Portland Maine Permaculture would like to thank the University of New England Environmental Council for their continued support of this movie series.
